Articles.Content:
I am very late at making my forum account and such! I just decided to!

So far, I think I'm at that stage where I'm about to jump from landing on Minmus and Mun, to other planets and such. I just managed a first docking, and dang it is hard!

I think my most ambitious thing (Stress on ambitious) was to randomly jump out one day and head for Minmus. I was so happy when I made it there!

Thanks!

Welcome to the forums!

Docking is hard, but luckily it gets easier with practice. It's definitely and acquired skill.

Wishing you the best of luck on your interplanetary endeavors. If you need any help, there's some tutorials in the Drawing Board (see my sig), and if you still have questions, feel free to stop by the "How-To" section.

Happy launching!

Happy launching!

You stole Captain Skunky's quote!

Let me join in on the plagurism fun!

Happy Launching and Fly Safe.
